bwwExcerpt: Ah, but the music in this show is so good, so good. As the younger Diamond, 'American Idol' winner Nick Fradiani sounds uncannily like Neil and brings rock-star presence to everything. He gives us Diamond's progression from a shy songwriter with a guitar to a showman who commanded spectacular arena ...
